upgrade.0: CRIT DMG increased by 20%. Increasing the value of a Bond of Life increases the DMG the equipping character deals by 12% for 6s. Max 3 stacks.
upgrade.1: CRIT DMG increased by 25%. Increasing the value of a Bond of Life increases the DMG the equipping character deals by 15% for 6s. Max 3 stacks.
upgrade.2: CRIT DMG increased by 30%. Increasing the value of a Bond of Life increases the DMG the equipping character deals by 18% for 6s. Max 3 stacks.
upgrade.3: CRIT DMG increased by 35%. Increasing the value of a Bond of Life increases the DMG the equipping character deals by 21% for 6s. Max 3 stacks.
upgrade.4: CRIT DMG increased by 40%. Increasing the value of a Bond of Life increases the DMG the equipping character deals by 24% for 6s. Max 3 stacks.

upgrade.0: 暴击伤害提升20%；生命之契的数值增加时，装备者造成的伤害提升12%。该效果持续6秒，至多叠加3次。

upgrade.0: 会心ダメージ+20%。命の契約の数値が増加する時、装備者の与えるダメージ+12%。この効果の継続時間は6秒、最大3層まで重ね掛け可能。JP0B
